rules_text:
Aechmi has first strike during your turn.
Ploy–Add {U}{R}{W}. You don't lose this mana as steps and phases end this turn. [i](When this creature attacks, you may trigger its ploy. If you do, sacrifice it at the next end step.)[/i]
When Aechmi dies, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to the number of spells cast this turn.
